stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, it gains X "Subroutine Do 1 net damage." subroutines for the remainder of this run. X is equal to the number of cards in the grip.
text: When the Runner encounters this ice, it gains X "[subroutine] Do 1 net damage." subroutines for the remainder of this run. X is equal to the number of cards in the grip.
title: Komainu
